summary: At this first version this mod adds 30 new loadscreens related with the knowledge about Tamriel. I used the concept images of Skyrim and some game screenshots to provide the best of game immersion I could creating a old paper texture.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.ketaros.com/skyrim/banner1.png[/img][/center]

- Overview -
--------------------------------------------
This mod adds 40 new loadscreens related with the knowledge about Tamriel. I used the concept images of Skyrim and some game screenshots to provide the best of game immersion I could creating a old paper texture.

- Version 1.5 -
--------------------------------------------
Added 12 more loadscreens, the themes are: Orsimer, Riften, Dragon Priests, Spriggans, Mehrunes Dagon, Azura, Sky Haven Temple, Tamriel, Boethiah and Daedra.

- Detailed Description -
--------------------------------------------
I created 40 loadscreens that uses a ancient paper style to provide informations related with locations, creatures and races from Tamriel. Got worried on doing something to improove the game immersion and enrich the Skyrim playing experience.

This mod only ADDs, it doesnt replaces, changes priorities or anything related about other loadscreens from the game.

- Compatibility -
--------------------------------------------
This mod is totaly compatible with ANY other mod and versions of Skyrim, with or without Dawnguard.

- Instalation -
--------------------------------------------
The simplest as possible, download using NMM and install it, or if you prefer, download manualy and copy the files to your Data folder.

- Credits -
--------------------------------------------
AurianaValoria1 - On Odahviing Screenshot.
author: Ketaroz
